---
category: news
title: "How virtual humans might help our lonely elderly"
excerpt: "Unlike robots — which have also been considered a solution to social isolation among the elderly — virtual humans are not expensive, are easy to deploy and are customisable. They can be shaped in any form and simulate the look and behaviour of anyone — something which isn't possible with a robot."
